## AddContentReturn.press() method

Presses a key on the keyboard. e.g. `Mod-X`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
press(key: string): AddContentReturn<GExtension>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>string</code> | the key to press (or string representing a key) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`AddContentReturn<GExtension>`
